text: It can be observed from the experimental results on the data sets of Text Retrieval Evaluation Conference ( TREC ) that the obvious performance improvement for query translation can be obtained , which is very beneficial to CLIR and can improve the whole retrieval performance In this paper , the proposed model improves the acquirement ability for OOV term translation through Web mining , and solves the translation pair selection and evaluation in a novel way by fusing multiple features and introducing the supervised learning based on Ranking SVM .
